comands:
clear
sudo apt-get install snapd
sudo snap install bitcoin-core
sudo ln -s /snap/bitcoin-core/current/bin/bitcoin{d,-cli} /usr/local/bin/
git clone https://github.com/ElementsProject/lightning.git
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y autoconf automake build-essential git libtool libsqlite3-dev python3 python3-pip net-tools zlib1g-dev libsodium-dev gettext
pip3 install --upgrade pip
pip3 install --user poetry
./configure --enable-developer && make -j7 && make install
mkdir ~/.bitcoin
. contrib/startup_regtest.sh
start_ln 2
bt-cli generatetoaddress 10 $(bt-cli getnewaddress)
bt-cli getbalances
l2-cli getinfo
l1-cli connect 027530d124566d735277cf74dd030b7ef6fba8f671e67ecd48075827989d977600@127.0.0.1:7272
l1-cli listpeers
l1-cli getinfo
l2-cli connect 0212e254cf5a6fd9074c40d0d86b95ada6576443ab4e275188e7a25bb920efc57e@127.0.0.1:7171
l2-cli listpeers
l1-cli newaddr
bt-cli sendtoaddress bcrt1qxlgkw57ue298lmtt4xpzstalgzzh8gmg3pgvke 1 btc
l1-cli listfunds
l2-cli newaddr
bt-cli sendtoaddress bcrt1qhgh2e65ktgzl945fyx7ea2cj39m08d2e6gegse 0.0005 btc
l2-cli listfunds
l1-cli fundchannel 027530d124566d735277cf74dd030b7ef6fba8f671e67ecd48075827989d977600 500000sat
l1-cli listchannels

lightning-cli is /home/rod/lightning/cli/lightning-cli
lightningd is /home/rod/lightning/lightningd/lightningd
Useful commands:
start_ln 3: start three nodes, l1, l2, l3
connect 1 2: connect l1 and l2
fund_nodes: connect all nodes with channels, in a row
stop_ln: shutdown
destroy_ln: remove ln directories
